org.apache.logging.log4j.core.osgi

类 BundleContextSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.selector.ClassLoaderContextSelector
      • org.apache.logging.log4j.core.osgi.BundleContextSelector
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    ContextSelector

    public class BundleContextSelector
extends ClassLoaderContextSelector
    ContextSelector for OSGi bundles. This ContextSelector works rather similarly to the ClassLoaderContextSelector, but instead of each ClassLoader having its own LoggerContext (like in a servlet container), each OSGi bundle has its own LoggerContext.
    从以下版本开始:
    2.1

    • 方法详细资料

      • getContext

        public LoggerContext getContext(String fqcn,
                                ClassLoader loader,
                                boolean currentContext,
                                URI configLocation)
        从接口复制的说明: ContextSelector
        Returns the LoggerContext.
        指定者:
        getContext 在接口中 ContextSelector
        覆盖:
        getContext 在类中 ClassLoaderContextSelector
        参数:
        fqcn - The fully qualified class name of the caller.
        loader - ClassLoader to use or null.
        currentContext - If true returns the current Context, if false returns the Context appropriate for the caller if a more appropriate Context can be determined.
        configLocation - The location of the configuration for the LoggerContext.
        返回:
        The LoggerContext.
